name: Poppycock
description:
What is Poppycock? Poppycock is a Gameboy microgame collection currently in development. Initially, the project was started for a game jam, however, due to time constraints, it was never completed. To nobody's surprise, game development is really hard, and so is burnout. Now though, we finally decided to release a short playable demo to showcase the fruits of our efforts. The finished version of Poppycock will feature various nonsensical games which you can pick up and play for short periods. Although that day may not come for a while, we hope that everyone will get to experience our vision for this game.    Controls For PC, use the Arrow Keys and Z
For Mobile, use the A button to mash and the B button to jump. Credits Felpies - Lead Programmer, Director, and Spritework.
Amber - Cover Artist, Character Designer, and Spritework.
https://twitter.com/sphyrnaa
Bee - Spritework Afterword If you enjoy Poppycock and are excited to see where our project goes, we would really appreciate it if you'd give us a good review and share our game with your friends. Also consider following my Twitter as linked above, where I will be posting updates and anything related to the game. It really goes a long way, and it helps our game be discovered by more people. Thank you so much for playing.
